unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Galore: Making Diwali Dreams a Reality!**
normalised: **Home Loan Schemes Galore: Making Diwali Dreams a Reality!**

unnormalised: Diwali’s just around the corner, and guess what? Banks are showering us with home loan schemes like never before! HDFC, ICICI, and even smaller co-operative banks like Saraswat Bank are offering enticing deals.
normalised: Diwali's just around the corner, and guess what? Banks are showering us with home loan schemes like never before! H D F C, I C I C I, and even smaller co-operative banks like Saraswat Bank are offering enticing deals.

unnormalised: Interest rates are dipping to around 8.5% – not bad, eh? Plus, many banks are waiving processing fees, saving you a pretty penny. My neighbour, Mrs. Sharma, just snagged a deal from SBI with pre-approved loan and minimal documentation.
normalised: Interest rates are dipping to around eight point five percent – not bad, eh? Plus, many banks are waiving processing fees, saving you a pretty penny. My neighbor, Missus Sharma, just snagged a deal from S B I with pre-approved loan and minimal documentation.

unnormalised: But before you jump in, do your homework, folks! Compare schemes, check the fine print, and see what fits your budget. Consider everything, from EMI options to pre-payment penalties.
normalised: But before you jump in, do your homework, folks! Compare schemes, check the fine print, and see what fits your budget. Consider everything, from E M I options to pre-payment penalties.

unnormalised: Planning on buying that cozy 2BHK in Bandra or a sprawling villa near Pune? Don't forget to factor in property registration costs and maintenance charges (Rs. 2 per sq ft, usually). Dr. Reddy advises, "A lower interest rate doesn't always mean the best deal. Look at the total cost!"
normalised: Planning on buying that cozy two B H K in Bandra or a sprawling villa near Pune? Don't forget to factor in property registration costs and maintenance charges (rupees two per square foot, usually). Doctor Reddy advises, "A lower interest rate doesn't always mean the best deal. Look at the total cost!"

unnormalised: So, this Diwali, maybe it’s time to make that dream of owning a home a reality. Shop around, negotiate hard, and happy house hunting! After all, apna ghar toh apna hi hota hai!
normalised: So, this Diwali, maybe it's time to make that dream of owning a home a reality. Shop around, negotiate hard, and happy house hunting! After all, apna ghar toh apna hi hota hai!
